text: His Chum the Baron is a 1913 American short comedy film. Harold Lloyd is said to have appeared in this film, but this is unconfirmed. ==Cast== * Ford Sterling * Hank Mann * Edgar Kennedy * Betty Schade * Vernon Smith * Harold Lloyd (unconfirmed) ==See also== * Harold Lloyd filmography ==External links== * Category:1913 films Category:American films Category:1913 short films Category:American silent short films Category:1913 comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: His Chum the Baron
